import React,{useState}from'react';import styles from'./Contact.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Contact=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',message:''});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert(`Gracias ${formData.name}, hemos recibido tu mensaje y te contactaremos pronto!`);setFormData({name:'',email:'',message:''});// Reinicia el formulario
